sentences.english: An adjustable strap allows you to comfortably adjust the mask to fit your face.
sentences.chinese: 眼罩後面的束帶可自由伸縮，根據臉型調整長短。

sentences.english: The key is finding a style that you both like and that flatters your face.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是找到一款你喜歡的並且和臉型相得益彰的髮式。

sentences.english: Doesn't help that i'm not great at remembering faces either.
sentences.chinese: 更不要說我一點也不擅長記認人的臉型。

sentences.english: How about bangs?It will suit your face shape.
sentences.chinese: 那就剪瀏海吧，很適合您的臉型。

sentences.english: Which shape is chosen is entirely dependent upon the shape and size of an individual's face.
sentences.chinese: 選擇那種形狀全取決於配戴者的臉型和大小。

sentences.english: The Chinese attractive face has a relatively narrow cheek, slim and thin face, and lantern jaw。
sentences.chinese: 中國美女臉頰較爲狹窄，臉型纖瘦，下巴突出。

sentences.english: His face is thin and he has a straight nose.
sentences.chinese: 臉型是瘦瘦的，有個直鼻子。

sentences.english: "Testosterone is linked to masculine face shapes and it also affects behavior, " Little told LiveScience.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸酮與男性化臉型有關，並且還可影響行爲。

sentences.english: If it looks good on your face, it would definitely enhance your overall personality.
sentences.chinese: 如果它和你的臉型和搭配它就能提高你整體的魅力。

definition: exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
hard to say/unpleasant to say/can't be sure
